Package com.wizzer.mle.math

This package contains math utilities for the Magic Lantern SDK.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MlAngle
    Utility class to help process angles.
    MlRotation
    This class specifies a rotation, used to define the orientation of a 3D object.
    MlScalar
    This class is a convenience class for specifying scalar values.
    MlTransform
    This class implements a 4x3 affine matrix of floating-point elements.
    MlVector2
    2D vector used to represent points or directions.
    MlVector3
    3D vector used to represent points or directions.
    MlVector4
    4D vector used to represent points or directions.

Package com.wizzer.mle.math Description

This package contains math utilities for the Magic Lantern SDK.

The package provides utilties for 2, 3 and 4 component vectors. It also provides a 4x3 affine matrix for calculating transformations. A rotation class is also provided, using a quaternion representation.
